li.p: Governor Dewine orders all schools to remain closed for the remainder of the year. DCS will continue distance learning and the meal program through this time. Thank you.

span.p: Governor Dewine orders all schools to remain closed for the remainder of the year. DCS will continue distance learning and the meal program through this time. Thank you.

a.span:
U.S. Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos has recognized 14 Ohio schools as National Blue Ribbon Schools for 2019. The program recognizes schools in one of two performance categories, based on all students’ scores and student subgroup scores on designated tests, as well as on graduation rates:
Exemplary High Performing Schools are among the state’s highest-performing schools as measured by state assessments or nationally normed tests. Exemplary Achievement Gap Closing Schools are among the state’s highest-performing schools in closing achievement gaps between the school’s student groups and all students.
